title: Here are all of the new products Apple is expected to launch by the end of the year
text:
New iPad Pro models

Bebeto Matthews/AP

Apple plans to upgrade the iPad Pro tablets it introduced last fall, according to Bloomberg.

These new high-end tablets will reportedly look very similar to their predecessors, but will include better cameras and faster processors. The launch would come after Apple already released new iPad Air and iPad mini models earlier this year. It also released a new version of the entry level $329 iPad in September.

It's unclear precisely when Apple would debut these new iPads, but in the past the company has announced them separately from the iPhone at events in October.
description: New AirPods and a 16-inch MacBook Pro could be among the products Apple may release over the coming months, according to reports.
